Player History
Had first career hit on 7/21/2013, off Wei-Yin Chen (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/28/2013, off Junichi Tazawa (BOS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 6/20/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Won Most Valuable Player in 2015, hitting .306 with 28 HR, 103 RBI...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2017, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2017, hitting .356 with 8 HR, 31 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 9/15/2017...
Won Most Valuable Player in 2017, hitting .300 with 30 HR, 107 RBI...
0/0/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,635,714 through salary arbitration...
2/2/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,635,714 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/11/2019 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
8/9/2019: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $20,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Had 6 hits with 5 RBI against Toronto on 5/6/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2020, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Injured on 5/20/2020 with a Torn Hamstring Muscle, out for full season...
Traded from Oakland to Chicago (N) on 7/20/2021 (Going to OAK: P Alfredo Delvalle. Going to CHC: LF Michael Choice, LF Paul Baca)...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 9/3/2021...
Retired in 2024.
Returns from retirement in 2025.
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/5/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $17,250,000 per year...
Hit for the cycle against Baltimore on 6/30/2025...
10/26/2026: Signed a contract extension with Boston, $15,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
